title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? The output is "MySomeClass".
OB: The current output is "MySomeAnn", but I expect the output to be "MySomeClass". This issue seems to be related to the Servlet 3.0 specification. It is worth noting that my code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
